name: Project Grove
description:
Project Grove is a 3D puzzle-platformer following legendary alchemist Edric and his plucky robot companion L-P1N on their quest to cure The Great Rot. Set in the vast forest of Dacrima, you explore its secrets; navigating dangerous terrain, collecting and experimenting with exotic flora.

Steam-powered technology has given rise to unprecedented feats of alchemy. During this great prosperity, an epidemic called “The Great Rot” has hit the Empire. Potentium, a robotics company, proposes a location for a cure: Dacrima, the rumoured birthplace of magic and its mythical Grove.

Project Grove is coming to Kickstarter in January 2020. For more info: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/antlerstudios/project-grove

What do you think of the demo? Is there something good that needs shouting about or something that needs improving? Join our Discord and tell us: https://discord.gg/AjBbrHJ

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Antler_Studios
